video_identification.title: We planted 100 OLIVE TREES in Wadi Rahim, Masafer Yatta

extracted_metadata.title: We planted 100 OLIVE TREES in Wadi Rahim, Masafer Yatta
extracted_metadata.description: Every Friday throughout February, we will plant saplings alongside Palestinian communities facing the harsh realities of occupation and settler violence. Join us in this vital and meaningful work in the field. Solidarity and partnership are our strongest responses to settler terror. Together, we can plant the seeds of hope and justice.
